content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Ms. Müller, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. The rental price I was thinking of is €900 per month. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I'm sure you'll find it a great investment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location and amenities of the apartment are quite appealing. However, I have to consider my budget as a student. Would it be possible to negotiate a lower price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Sure, Ms. Müller, let's negotiate. I'll start with €850. Remember, I'm only willing to go so low because of your student status. I'm sure you understand that I need to make a reasonable profit from my investment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Herr Schmidt. €850 is closer to what I had in mind. Could we discuss the terms of the lease as well? For example, is there any flexibility with the deposit or the length of the lease?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Ms. Müller. I'm willing to negotiate the terms of the lease as well. The deposit is currently set at two months' rent, but I could consider reducing it to one and a half months' rent. As for the length of the lease, I prefer a two-year lease, but if you sign a three-year lease, I could consider reducing the rent by €20.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting offer, Herr Schmidt. A three-year lease could be beneficial for me as a student for the stability it provides. However, I would like to discuss the possibility of a one-year lease with the option to renew, given my uncertain academic schedule. Would that be something you would consider?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Ms. Müller, but I cannot offer a one-year lease. The cost of renting in the city center is high, and I need a longer lease to cover the cost of the mortgage. However, I'm willing to offer a two-year lease with a fixed rent of €850 per month, and if you sign a three-year lease, I can reduce the rent by €20 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Herr Schmidt. The two-year lease with a fixed rent of €850 per month is quite attractive. I'm happy to accept that offer. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
